bean.p:render: @{document.mainSerialReceivingHistoryList ne null and document.mainSerialReceivingHistoryList.size()>0 and document.displayMainHistory eq true}
@{document.supplementSerialReceivingHistoryList ne null and document.supplementSerialReceivingHistoryList.size()>0 and document.displaySupplementaryHistory eq true}
@{document.indexSerialReceivingHistoryList ne null and document.indexSerialReceivingHistoryList.size()>0 and document.displayIndexHistory eq true}
